entity: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry (2007)
rec: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry (2007)
resp: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry (2007) is a great flick. If that's your genre you should watch Wedding Crashers (2005). You will be laughing throughout the entire movie.
